action: I want to search and filter registered customers
reason: To quickly access necessary customer information and improve sales efficiency
acceptance_criteria: Customer search is only possible for authenticated users.
Roles without permissions cannot view the customer list.
Partial match search by customer name is possible.
Search by email address is possible.
Search by phone number is possible.
Address filtering by country and prefecture is possible.
Filtering by customer status (Active/Dormant/Suspended) is possible.
Multiple search conditions can be specified simultaneously (AND condition).
Pagination functionality must be implemented.
The number of items per page is configurable.
SQL injection countermeasures must be implemented.
Input values must be sanitized (Anti-XSS).
Target response time for search API is within 500ms.
Personal information masking settings can be applied to search results.
Display fields are controlled based on user permissions.
Search history logs must be stored.
Logs include user_id, search conditions, and timestamp.
Rate limiting is applied to the search API.
API must be REST-compliant.
Audit logs are stored in tamper-evident storage.
